title: Scoop: US loses Gavi board seat after withholding funding
description: “As the United States government has not yet pledged to Gavi it is currently not on the Gavi Board,” a Gavi spokesperson told Devex.

title: When can small grants give big value?
description: Opinion: Small, flexible grants are not a substitute for larger funding, but by focusing on uptake over immediate outputs, they can be catalytic in driving long-term change, from strengthening capacity to shifting organizational practice.

title: Sen. Coons expects Senate to pass, Trump to sign $50B aid budget bill
description: At the World Economic Forum in Davos, the Democratic senator said he is hopeful that lawmakers will pass — and Trump will sign —  a multimillion-dollar foreign aid funding bill currently being discussed on Capitol Hill.
